meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Samantha Budesa Dennis Lloyd Matt Jackson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7138.

td.p: Samantha Budesa, a billing coordinator from Cookeville, Tennessee
Dennis Lloyd, a publisher from Madison, Wisconsin
Matt Jackson, a paralegal from Washington, D.C. (whose 3-day cash winnings total $81,200)

tr.td: JESUS
5 SHADES OF GRAY
CELEBRITY DATE BOOK
SUPERLATIVE STATES
EDUCATION
A FEW GOOD "MEN"
(Alex: And finally, we're looking for [*] because each correct response will end in those three letters of the alphabet.)

The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law.
